attributes.action: To allow the English a vote on having an English only Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In Great Britian you can be Irish, Welsh,Scotish and British. What you cannot be is English. England needs its own representation, its own government with English only members. At present England dominated by Scotish Ministers. England is the only British country without its own assembly and this is totally unfair on the English.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
